statements: SELECT * FROM group_fitness_classes ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE location = 'Gym A';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, location FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE class_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM group_fitness_classes ORDER BY start_time DESC, end_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM group_fitness_classes ORDER BY class_date DESC, start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, location FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT class_id, class_name, capacity FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE location = 'Gym A' AND instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY class_date ASC, start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time, location FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT * FROM reminders
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_message, reminder_date FROM reminders
SELECT reminder_message, reminder_date, member_id FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC
SELECT * FROM group_classes WHERE class_capacity > 20
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_date FROM group_classes ORDER BY class_date
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE class_id = 1
SELECT reminder_message, reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE member_id = 5 ORDER BY reminder_date DESC
SELECT class_name, class_date, class_instructor FROM group_classes WHERE class_capacity > 20
SELECT reminder_message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY reminder_date ASC
SELECT reminder_message, class_name, class_instructor FROM reminders INNER JOIN group_classes ON reminders.class_id = group_classes.class_id
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, reminder_message FROM reminders WHERE class_id = 'c6ff06d9-4562-4df1-a7d9-8bc0d34d7d53';
SELECT class_name, class_instructor FROM classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, member_email, member_phone FROM members WHERE member_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, reminder_message FROM reminders WHERE class_id = 'c421c9c0-7ef4-4a92-9e5e-92e1c035061d';
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE class_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM members WHERE member_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_date, class_time FROM classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_message FROM reminders JOIN members ON reminders.member_id = members.member_id WHERE members.member_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM GroupFitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, class_date, class_time FROM GroupFitnessClasses ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE class_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Members WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date, class_time FROM GroupFitnessClasses JOIN Reminders ON GroupFitnessClasses.class_id = Reminders.class_id;
SELECT * FROM GroupFitnessClasses ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC;
SELECT class_name, class_date, class_time FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT member_name, email, phone_number FROM Members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM Reminders r JOIN GroupFitnessClasses g ON r.class_id = g.class_id WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-01-01' AND reminder_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT u.update_message, u.update_date, g.class_name FROM Updates u JOIN GroupFitnessClasses g ON u.class_id = g.class_id ORDER BY u.update_date DESC, u.update_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, reminder_time FROM reminders WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT class_name, class_description, class_date, class_time FROM classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, member_email, member_phone FROM members;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE class_time < '14:00:00'
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM classes ORDER BY class_date DESC
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM members WHERE member_phone IS NOT NULL
SELECT notification_type, notification_date, notification_time FROM notifications
